content: this is a written pattern for a pie beret and matching pie purse worked mostly using a 4mm hook important note full credit for the pie beret idea goes to designer regina rioux 1 it seems that she released a set of three pie-ret patterns on her blog in 2008 but they are no longer available online here is her > ravelry post 2 and her blog post 3 the matching pie purse is my own idea i do not feel comfortable charging for a pattern based on a different designer s idea so this will be available for free if you would like to support me please consider checking out my other ravelry patterns stay tuned for future pattern releases shout-out also to my cousin ca8ty 4 who posted this beret and purse on her tiktok 5 and modeled for me love you 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/regina-rioux 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pie-rets 3 https //monstercrochet blogspot com/2008/11/holiday-pie-rets html 4 https //www tiktok com/@ca8ty 5 https //www tiktok com/@ca8ty/video/7181915316048399659
